instruction:
Organize the following sentence into a meaningful paragraph.

He decided to take a break. He looked at the scenery. He was amazed.
input: He decided to take a break. He looked at the scenery. He was amazed.
output: He decided to take a break, and as he looked around, he was amazed by the scenery. Everywhere he looked there were vibrant colors, and a feeling of peacefulness washed over him. He felt refreshed and refocused.
